name: STAR WARS: A GALAXY FAR, FAR AWAY

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Yoda, The Grandmaster deals combat damage, bolster 1, then choose one:
• [i]Do—[/i]For each attacking creature with power less than Yoda's, you may have that creature assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
• [i]Do Not[/i]—Untap each attacking creature with power less than Yoda's and remove them from combat.

[i]Campaign[/i] — When Chancellor Palpatine enters, each player votes for Friend or For. For each player who voted Foe, destroy target creature they control. For each player who voted Friend, you draw a card and put three +1/+1 counters on target creature.
Until end of turn, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery that would target a creature, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Your feeble skills are no match for the power of the dark side!”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Vader's Wrath deals 2 damage to each creature you don't control with power 2 or less. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“All I am surrounded by is fear, and dead men.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
Ahsoka, Forsaken Padawan can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or more.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by this creature this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ahsoka.

Trample
As long as this artifact is untapped, it has protection from mana value 3 or less. [i](This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything with mana value 3 or less.)[/i]
Crew 4

Menace, Ward {2}
Whenever Vader, Embodiment of Evil attacks, put a stun counter on up to 3 creatures. Those creatures gain -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of times you've cast a commander this game.

[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Exile target creature card from your graveyard. Then, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the exiled creatures power. If the exiled creature was legendary, the chosen creature gains vigilance until end of turn.

Choose one:
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Siege Strike deals 2 damage to each creature.
Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. Each of those tokens deals 1 damage to any target. You lose 2 life and draw a card.

[i][i]Landfall[/i] [/i]— Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
Whenever you play a permanent from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Obi-Wan, The Wanderer.

Forcecasting {1}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its Forcecasting cost if you tap a legendary creature when you cast it. That creature doesn't untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
Draw three cards.

Scry 2, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a legendary creature card, draw two cards. If not, draw a card.

{1}{W}, Sacrifice this enchantment: You gain 3 life.

Trample
Whenever a creature enters, if that creature was cast from anywhere other than a player's hand, Jabba's Rancor fights that creature.

Menace
When Darth Vader, Dark Dawn enters, each player sacrifices a creature.
[i]Force Rage [/i]— Whenever a player sacrifices one or more creatures, Darth Vader gains haste and deathtouch until end of turn.

Bounty: Create a treasure token. [i](When you cast this spell, put a bounty counter on target creature you don't control. When that creature dies, you Create a treasure token.)[/i]
Bounty Blaze deals 3 damage to any target.

Menace
Whenever Vader, Emperor's Fist enters or attacks, create a 1/1 white Stormtrooper creature token.
At the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of up to one target creature with mana value X or less until end of turn, where X is the number of Stormtroopers you control. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

• Create a 1/1 white Stormtrooper token.
• This creature deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Ashes of pain wash away under the Empire's rule.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Forcecasting {2}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its Forcecasting cost if you tap a legendary creature when you cast it. That creature doesn't untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
Choose two target creatures. They deal damage equal to their power to each other. If this spell was forcecasted, one of those creatures gains haste until end of turn.

[i]Force Agility [/i]— Obi-Wan, Jedi Mentor has protection from instants and sorceries that deal damage.
Whenever Obi-Wan attacks, if another creature you control with lesser power attacks, that creatures power becomes Obi-Wan's until end of turn.

Forcecasting {U}{R} [i](You may cast this spell for its Forcecasting cost if you tap a legendary creature when you cast it. That creature doesn't untap during your next untap step.)[/i]
Force Lightning deals 2 damage to target creature. If you cast this spell for its forcecasting cost, tap that creature and put a stun counter on it.

Flash
When this card enters or leaves the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.
{1}{U}, Sacrifice Jump into Hyperspeed: Draw a card.

When Yoda enters, you may put a basic land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Surveil 1, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a legendary creature card, you may draw a card.

Haste, Flying
Instant and sorcery spells in your hand have “Bounty — Create a treasure token.”
Whenever a creature with a bounty counter on it dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter.

Draw a card, then discard a card.

Bounty: Draw a card. [i](When you cast this spell, put a bounty counter on target creature you don't control. When that creature dies, you Draw a card.)[/i]
Destroy target creature. That creature can't be the same creature that was the target of the bounty.

Indestructible, Menace
[i]Force Mastery [/i]— Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery, if it targets a creature you don't control, put a +1/+1 counter on Valkorion.
If Valkorion were to be put into a graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle him into your library instead.
